title: The Sunflower Cafe
description: A vegetarian cafe with daily vegan and gluten free options, including soup, a sunflower cafe bean burger - served with a tomato salsa, side salad and garlic potato cubes and cake served with soya cream. BYOB with no corkage fee. Cute and kitschy cafe, set in a picturesque courtyard, has a relaxed atmosphere. Located on the grounds of Sonairte Ecology Centre. Animal and child-friendly. The Matthews bus from Dublin stops right outside the cafe (Sonairte stop).
